item.title: Headphones
item.author: Author
item.description: At home while writing, photo editing or just for fun. At work when I need to focus and be effective. At the time when I need a boost or completely opposite – when looking for a way to calm down. Headphones accompany me throughout the day. There is something about sound that keeps me going. When I need to keep up and focus on something certain, I listen to some energy energetic music.

item.title: The right people
item.author: Author
item.description: Each of us has some ideal places, songs, people and the way how the morning coffee should be prepared. Sometimes the way how negative situations happen describe the way our day, week, life look like. The way we are. Funnily enough, very often those things or people are just happening around us, the way we often don’t even notice it. We often can only notice the result of all those things.
